name: TechnoFeed
description: A news reader powered by www.newsapi.org developed for android devices running SDK23 (Marshmallow) and above. It supports features like - keyword search, sorting by sources, etc.

name: TechnoMIT-2K18
description: Website for TechnoMIT-2K18, a state level event, annual technical festival organized by Computer Science and engineering department of Maharashtra Institute of Technology, Aurangabad.

name: BioHazard Sound Mod
description: This is an audio mod that utilizes different sound processing libs and drivers from various OEMs, combined all together, and the result is a very deep modification on how Android processes Audio.

name: Project-X ROM
description: Project-X is made for Music geeks like me, its main focus is stability and Audio. It is Based off latest firmware currently, and will always be using the most up to date firmware base.
